title: Topic 03 Question 04
body: You need to notify the database owner when the database settings, such as the database size and pricing tier, are modified in Azure.
options: Create a diagnostic setting for the activity log that has the Security log enabled.
For the database, create a diagnostic setting that has the InstanceAndAppAdvanced metric enabled.
Create an alert rule that uses a Metric signal type.
Create an alert rule that uses an Activity Log signal type.
